channel.title: Mitb's 317 refactored - headIcons?
channel.description:
I see his refactored has headIcons, but does it load them and show them correctly? Because server sided I am sending them correctly - but they are not showing ? Also - 377 cache.
server side, obviously: [code] playerProps.writeByte(p.headIcon); // headicon. [/code]
The client reads them fine and in order.. and checks if it isnt 0, and if it isnt 0 then it draws the headIcon.
headIcon is set to 1 when the player logs in (for testing), also updateRequired and appearanceUpdateRequired flags [i]are[/i] being called, yes.
